channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Mixed as Goldman Sachs, Bank of America Report Earnings
item.description: Major indexes were mixed. The Dow and the S&P 500 both closed at record highs Monday.

item.title: Activist Palliser Pushes for Change at AI Chip Investor SK Square
item.description: The hedge fund has built a more than 1% stake in the South Korean company, which is the largest shareholder in chip maker SK Hynix.

item.title: Goldman Sachs beats on profit and revenue as stock trading and investment banking boost results
item.description: Wall Street trading and investment banking has helped the big banks this quarter, and Goldman Sachs results showed why they are a leader in those area...

item.title: Euro Might Fall Over Medium-Term Even if ECB Offers Short-Term Boost
item.description: Any short-term gains in the euro are unlikely to last, even as the currency could rise in the near term if European Central Bank sounds cautious about...

item.title: Bank of America tops estimates on better-than-expected trading revenue
item.description: Bank of America benefited from its Wall Street trading and banking divisions in the third quarter, just as rival JPMorgan Chase did.

item.title: Goldman Sachs's Wall Street Businesses Gain Steam, Sending Profit Up 45%
item.description: The bank posted strong growth in investment banking and asset and wealth management.

item.title: Citigroup earnings top estimates, boosted by investment banking
item.description: The bank's third-quarter report was stronger than Wall Street expected but still showed a year-over-year decline in earnings.

item.title: He Was a Monk, Then a Billionaire and Now an Alleged Tax Cheat
item.description: Michigan philanthropist Manoj Bhargava made a fortune on his path to enlightenment, and he doesnâ€™t want to share it with the U.S. government.

item.title: Ericsson shares jump 10% on third-quarter beat, growth in North America sales
item.description: Shares of Swedish telecom firm Ericsson jumped amid third-quarter core earnings that surpassed analyst expectations and growth North American demand.

item.title: Walgreens says it will close 1,200 stores by 2027, as earnings top estimates
item.description: The drugstore chain Walgreens said it plans to close roughly 1,200 stores over the next three years, which includes 500 closures in fiscal 2025 alone.
